summary: Episode 417 – Dr. David Perlmutter – The Present and Future of Health and Nutrition
title: Episode 417 – Dr. David Perlmutter – The Present and Future of Health and Nutrition
body:
We’re back with Episode 417 of The Paleo Solution Podcast. We have one of my favorite guests of all time back on the show, Dr. David Perlmutter. Dr. Perlmutter is a Board-Certified Neurologist and four-time New York Times bestselling author (author of Grain Brain). He serves on the Board of Directors and is a Fellow of the American College of Nutrition. Listen in as we talk about how the science of health and nutrition has progressed and where it’s going, ketogenic diets, fasting, alzheimer’s, diabetes, medication, and much more.

Show Notes:

00:47 – Pre-intro/Summary
2:12 – Introducing Dr. Perlmutter
3:34 – How has the science behind Grain Brain progressed
8:45 – Health care crisis and important things to focus on
17:50 – How the view of dietary fat has changed in the past 5 years
21:41 – Dr. Perlmutter’s visit with Nestle
25:24 – Why ketogenic diets have become so popular
28:48 – Alzheimer’s ineffective medications
31:08 – Statin drugs increasing diabetes risk
33:58 – Comparing diabetes treatment with medications vs ketogenic diet
34:23 – Diet template and paleo
38:54 – Plants able to change gut bacteria genes
42:15 – Connection
43:28 – Fasting
51:20 – Muscle loss and fasting
57:40 – Things to be aware of and how to thrive on keto
59:49 – Predictions for the next 5 years
1:04:15 – Where you can find Dr. Perlmutter

Website: DrPerlmutter.com

YouTube: The Empowering Neurologist

Book: Grain Brain (Revised and Updated)

Transcript:

Coming soon…

 

Keto Masterclass

The keto diet is one of the most effective ways to shed fat and improve your health. Keto Masterclass helps you start keto right, step-by-step, so that you can be successful long-term.

Learn More

Don’t forget, Wired to Eat is now available!

Amazon, Barnes & Noble, IndieBound, iBooks



from Health & Wellness https://robbwolf.com/2018/12/06/episode-417-dr-david-perlmutter-the-present-and-future-of-health-and-nutrition/
via http://www.rssmix.com/

summary: Are my strength goals realistic? via /r/Fitness
title: Are my strength goals realistic? via /r/Fitness
body:
Are my goals unrealistic? I’m trying to hit the 1000lb club in the next 12 months.

Current stats: - 5’6 150 pounds male

  • Lifting for last 10 years (but not optimally or consistently). Focused in the past on cardio (marathons)

  • Started a powerlifting program 2 week ago and already seeing gains like I haven’t in years (candito). I can’t do long distance running anymore due to severe plantar fasciitis (doesn’t seem to affect my ability to lift)

  • current PRs: Bench - 275 Squat - 290 Dead - 365

Thanks!



Submitted December 06, 2018 at 04:35AM by lookingforsupps
via reddit https://ift.tt/2zMNJI9

summary:
Day 5 of 30 days of giving back. 

I enjoy my time as a governing council member of the Maricopa Integrated Health System FQHC...
caption:
Day 5 of 30 days of giving back.

I enjoy my time as a governing council member of the Maricopa Integrated Health System FQHC look-a-likes (FQHC LAL). This is an all volunteer board that is responsible for the direction of the FQHC LAL’s. I am constantly learning more about what access to health cate means. We are discovering outcomes to various decision and policies. We delve into the world of population health management and social determinants of health.

This year is an extremely exciting time and many things are in motion regarding Prop 480 funding and the MIHS bond. We are looking for new Governing Council Members with the following preferences:
-You must get excited about helping the community reach their health goals.
-You must be a user of MIHS services.
-You can not be a current employee.
-You must be able to meet on the first weds evening of every month and maybe two other various days throughout the month.

Message Barbara Harding if you are interested. Barbara.Harding@mihs.org
http://mihs.org/about-mihs/governing-council

#MIHS #safetynet #health #healthservices #FQHC #socialdeterminantsofhealth #populationhealthmanagement (at Maricopa Integrated Health System)
https://www.instagram.com/p/BrDEP2wBlPl/?utm_source=ig_tumblr_share&igshid=ci2nds24b1gr

summary: Adam Craig Isn’t Slowing Down for Retirement: Repping the EWS, Building Trails
title: Adam Craig Isn’t Slowing Down for Retirement: Repping the EWS, Building Trails
body:
Professional mountain biker and Olympian Adam Craig is “retired,” but he’s still working hard to bring EWS events to the US and advocating for new mountain bike trails.

summary:
Advance Nutratech L-Threonine pre-workout Supplement (100g Powder)
Threonine is an essential amino acid that promotes normal...
caption:
Advance Nutratech L-Threonine pre-workout Supplement (100g Powder)
